Okay, before I post, here a few things. First off, my list.

Brix-Maximal
Fliq(this will be Octociz' new name when he gets his new beast mode)-
Maximal
Vulois-neutral
Terminess-dead-suicide(planted explosives)

Next I need a clairification. I know that their are 2 factions of 
Preds, and Megatron is trying to unite them all, but I've been gone 
for awhile(and will be gone next week. Sorry!) but are their two 
factions of MAXIMALS? Are the Maxis at the Cybertronian Fire one and 
The Ark the other? Please clairify.

One last thing: welcome back JP.
______________________________________________________________________


Vulois' mind snapped back into his head. He couldn't believe he just 
did that. In a few moments, that funny feeling ws gone and he was 
fully in the embassy. He was happy that The Matrix was giving him 
advice, and was also hopeful that Rex would take into consideration 
what he said/ He decided he needed some frsh air.

When he stepped outside, he saw some figures heading towards him. Or 
were they? They were too far away to tell if they were coming to him 
or passing over him. But like all things, time will tell.

______________________________________________________________________
\

Octociz looked at Ramulus. This was it. New body time. He just hoped 
Ramulus could do this.

"Okay, I'm going to give control to Brix and go off line. He is going 
to open the chest hatch and remove my spark, and place it in this pod 
and shut it. I've programmed it to make me a protoform once the lid 
is shut. But's that's just as far I could go. Brix doesn't know 
machines, and the automatic DNA Scanner isn't working. You have to 
use these mangled controls to activate it. Ready?"
